channel.title: How do i get prayer to work? how do i get range to work? jad hits too high
channel.description: hi i have a server but i cant get prayer to work... this isnt the only thing that doesnt work because range doesnt either :S can anyone help please? also is there anyway i can lower the max hits for jad... its hitting 99s on me and ive tried raising the armour defence bonus but its still hitting too high... i made it have 1k hp lol :D i dont even hit it i hit 0s... (well i dont have much of a chance to hit it cause its killing me all the time ;L) thankyou very much if you can help :D

item.title: How do i get prayer to work? how do i get range to work? jad hits too high
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

there are tutorials for working prayer and range. as for the high hits of jad, go to npchandler.java and search 2745 (jad’s npc id) and there will be a max hit and minimum hit change those.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get prayer to work? how do i get range to work? jad hits too high

item.title: How do i get prayer to work? how do i get range to work? jad hits too high
item.dc:creator: @dharokamin dharokamin
item.description:
@dharokamin wrote:

hi i have a server but i cant get prayer to work…
this isnt the only thing that doesnt work because range doesnt either :S
can anyone help please?
also is there anyway i can lower the max hits for jad… its hitting 99s on me and ive tried raising the armour defence bonus but its still hitting too high…
i made it have 1k hp lol i dont even hit it i hit 0s… (well i dont have much of a chance to hit it cause its killing me all the time ;L)
thankyou very much if you can help
